default-public.name: Global fishing activity
default-public.description: Monitor vessel-based human activity at sea in near real-time based on global automatic identification system (AIS) and vessel monitoring system (VMS) data from our partner countries.

carrier-portal-public.name: Carrier Vessel Portal
carrier-portal-public.description: Verify transshipments, track vessels and identify frequently-visited ports to gain a better understanding of carrier vessel activities needed to strengthen transparency and accelerate transshipment reform.

deep-sea-mining-public.name: Deep Sea Mining Watch
deep-sea-mining-public.description: Deep Sea Mining Watch aims to increase transparency in the nascent industry of seabed mining for critical minerals by highlighting historical and ongoing vessel activity in high seas areas that are currently slated for mineral exploration.

carrier-portal-report.name: Carrier Vessel Portal
carrier-portal-report.description: Verify transshipments, track vessels and identify frequently-visited ports to gain a better understanding of carrier vessel activities needed to strengthen transparency and accelerate transshipment reform.

activity-report.name: Global Vessel Activity
activity-report.description: Monitor Apparent Fishing Effort and Vessel Presence in near real-time based on global automatic identification system (AIS) and vessel monitoring system (VMS) data from our partner countries.

detections-report.name: Global Dark Vessel Detections
detections-report.description: Synthetic aperture radar (SAR) can detect at-sea vessels and structures in any weather conditions. The night lights detections (VIIRS) shows vessels at sea that satellites have detected by the light they emit at night.

events-report.name: Global Vessel Events
events-report.description: Global activity on vessel events based on automatic identification system (AIS) , including encounters between two vessels, loitering and port visits.

ascension-public.name: Pulau Ascension
ascension-public.description: Pulau Ascension terletak di tengah Samudra Atlantik. Pada 2019, seluruh 445.000 kilometer persegi (171.800 mil persegi) perairan Ascension ditetapkan sebagai kawasan perlindungan laut.

fiji-public.name: Fiji
fiji-public.description: Terletak di Pasifik Selatan, Republik Fiji terdiri dari 322 pulau dan memiliki zona ekonomi eksklusif lebih dari 1,2 juta kilometer persegi (460.000 mil persegi).

galapagos-public.name: Galápagos
galapagos-public.description: Cagar Alam Laut Galapagos merupakan situs Warisan Dunia UNESCO, mencakup 133.000 kilometer persegi (51.300 mil persegi) Samudra Pasifik di lepas pantai Amerika Selatan.

guyana-public.name: Guyana
guyana-public.description: Zona ekonomi eksklusif Guyana terletak di lepas pantai timur laut Amerika Selatan dan mencakup lautan seluas 137.000 kilometer persegi (52.800 mil persegi).

micronesia-public.name: Federasi Mikronesia
micronesia-public.description: Terdiri dari 607 pulau, empat negara bagian Federasi Mikronesia (Yap, Chuuk, Pohnpei, dan Kosrae) memiliki zona ekonomi eksklusif lebih dari 2,6 juta kilometer persegi (1 juta mil persegi).

maldives-public.name: Maladewa
maldives-public.description: Republik Maladewa adalah negara kepulauan yang terletak di Samudra Hindia dan memiliki tatanan terumbu karang terbesar ketujuh di dunia. Maladewa memiliki zona ekonomi eksklusif yang mencakup area seluas hampir 1 juta kilometer persegi (385.000 mil persegi).

niue-public.name: Niue
niue-public.description: Niue terletak Samudra Pasifik bagian tengah dan kawasan lindung laut Moana Mahu mencakup 40 persen dari zona ekonomi eksklusif Niue, yang mencakup 127.000 kilometer persegi (49.000 mil persegi).

palau-public.name: Palau
palau-public.description: Republik Palau adalah sekumpulan pulau yang terletak di Samudra Pasifik Barat. Pada tahun 2020, Palau sepenuhnya melindungi 80% zona ekonomi eksklusifnya untuk membentuk Suaka Laut Nasional Palau, yang mewakili 475.077 kilometer persegi (183.000 mil persegi), dengan menutup perairan ini untuk semua bentuk kegiatan ekstraktif, termasuk penangkapan ikan.

tristan-public.name: Tristan da Cunha
tristan-public.description: Tristan da Cunha adalah pulau terpencil di Samudra Atlantik Selatan. Pada tahun 2020, komunitas Tristan da Cunha menetapkan 90 persen dari 690.000 kilometer persegi (266.400 mil persegi) zona lautnya untuk perlindungan laut.

mediterranean-public.name: Mediterania dan Laut Hitam
mediterranean-public.description: Mediterania dan Laut Hitam mencakup hampir 3 juta kilometer persegi (1,1 juta mil persegi) lautan antara Eropa dan Afrika.

costa_rica_amps-public.name: Costa Rica
costa_rica_amps-public.description: Cocos Island National Park is a fully protected area spanning nearly 55,000 square kilometers. Bicentennial Marine Managed Area which surrounds Cocos Island National Park is 106,000 square kilometers.

colombia-public.name: Colombia
colombia-public.description: Colombia has created and managed MPAs along its Pacific and Caribbean coasts spanning Yurupari-Malpelo Integrated Management District, where the fully protected Malpelo Sanctuary of Fauna and Flora is nested, Lomas and Colinas, Gorgona, and Cabo Manglares in the Pacific Ocean, as well as Beata and Corales de Profundidad in the Caribbean Sea.

panama-public.name: Panama
panama-public.description: Marine protected areas in Panama total just over 98,000 square kilometers (approximately 38,000 square miles), which include Coiba National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage Site that is a coastal marine protected area off the southwest coast, and the Coiba Ridge Managed Resource Area.

reserva_de_la_biosfera_cmar-public.name: CMAR core MPAs
reserva_de_la_biosfera_cmar-public.description: Initiated in 2004, the Eastern Tropical Pacific Marine Corridor is a voluntary regional cooperative effort to protect one of the most productive and biodiverse ecosystems.

galapagos_y_hermandad-public.name: Galapagos and Hermandad
galapagos_y_hermandad-public.description: Galápagos Marine Reserve covers 133,000 square kilometers (51,300 square miles) of Pacific Ocean off the coast of South America. The Galápagos Marine Reserve was expanded with the creation of the Hermandad Marine Reserve to cover an additional 60,000 square kilometers (23,000 square miles).

revillagigedo-public.name: Revillagigedo
revillagigedo-public.description: Centered on four volcanic islands south of Mexico’s Baja California peninsula, Revillagigedo National Park was created in 2017 and spans 148,000 square kilometers.
